about_the_game:
Advent 6 Book

This Advent-themed book unlocks 24 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! It's Christmassssss! Celebrate again with Coloring Pixels.

Play during the month of December to get the full Advent experience! 1 image will unlock every day between the 1st and the 24th like a true Advent calendar!

Contents

The Advent 6 book unlocks the following images:

  • Day 1: Mr and Ms Claus - 88x70px

  • Day 2: Cat in a Stocking - 47x91px

  • Day 3: Cookies - 125x39px

  • Day 4: Sleepy Kitty - 75x35px

  • Day 5: Cracker - 35x35px

  • Day 6: Snowglobe - 78x91px

  • Day 7: Hungry Bunny - 71x76

  • Day 8: Cozy Window - 127x152px

  • Day 9: Christmas Jumper - 75x75px

  • Day 10: Latvian Christmas - 58x52

  • Day 11: Winter Scenes - 100x100px

  • Day 12: Robin in a Wreath - 102x94px

  • Day 13: The Pickle - 23x43px

  • Day 14: Christmas Mouse - 64x82px

  • Day 15: Gävle Goat - 146x95px

  • Day 16: North Pole - 102x102px

  • Day 17: Pattern: 101x100pc

  • Day 18: Lantern Diorama - 92x159px

  • Day 19: The Tree - 71x105px

  • Day 20: Teddy Bear - 42x52px

  • Day 21: Flaming Pudding - 57x61px

  • Day 22: - Festive in the Office - 102x92px

  • Day 23: Night Sky - 102x172px

  • Day 24: Decorations - 168x104px

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Advent 6 Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
